content: this crochet pattern will help you to create a mice pie christmas ornament **christmas stocking ornament crochet pattern** crochet a cute christmas ornament for the holidays with this easy one-piece no-sew mini stocking pattern perfect for dk weight 3 yarn it s beginner-friendly and works up quickly the downloadable pdf includes clear instructions for creating adorable ornaments the crochet pattern is 4 pages long and written in english and us crochet terms the pattern contains plenty of progress photos to guide you along and is an easy skill level project **supplies** 4mm crochet hook dk weight yarn scissors sewing needle **yarn** weight dk / light worsted/ #3 brand stylecraft squeeze me dk a - red b - green c - white total 20 yards **gauge** 4mm hook 2″ x 2″ swatch = 4 row of 7 double_crochet **finished size** width 5 5cm x height 10cm **abbreviations us terms ** chain chain double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet magic_ring magic_ring r round / row rs right side single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st/sts stitch/stitches treble_crochet treble_crochet ws wrong side **skill level** easy **notes** a free online basic version of this crochet pattern is available at https //hookfully com/mini-crochet-christmas-stocking-ornament-free-pattern/ due to the nature of the product no refunds will be issued
